info.name: CodeFolio API Tests
info.description: Collection complète pour tester toutes les fonctionnalités de l'API GraphQL CodeFolio

body.raw:
{
  "query": "mutation CreateVisitor($ip_address: String!, $country: String!, $city: String!, $isp: String!, $user_agent: String!, $referrer: String!, $accept_language: String!, $screen_resolution: String!, $device_type: String!, $timestamp: String!, $visit_time: String!, $pages_visited: [String]!, $session_duration: Int!) {\n  createVisitor(ip_address: $ip_address, country: $country, city: $city, isp: $isp, user_agent: $user_agent, referrer: $referrer, accept_language: $accept_language, screen_resolution: $screen_resolution, device_type: $device_type, timestamp: $timestamp, visit_time: $visit_time, pages_visited: $pages_visited, session_duration: $session_duration) {\n    id\n    ip_address\n    country\n    city\n    isp\n    user_agent\n    referrer\n    accept_language\n    screen_resolution\n    device_type\n    timestamp\n    visit_time\n    pages_visited\n    session_duration\n  }\n}",
  "variables": {
    "ip_address": "192.168.1.100",
    "country": "Morocco",
    "city": "Rabat",
    "isp": "Maroc Telecom",
    "user_agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36",
    "referrer": "https://google.com",
    "accept_language": "fr-FR,fr;q=0.9,en;q=0.8",
    "screen_resolution": "1920x1080",
    "device_type": "Desktop",
    "timestamp": "2024-01-15T10:30:00Z",
    "visit_time": "10:30:00",
    "pages_visited": ["/", "/projects", "/about"],
    "session_duration": 300
  }
}
